Checks whether the player is pointing towards a chip block. Sends an error message to the player in case no chip was found.

Parameters:

sender -
Returns:
The chip pointed by the player or null if one was not found.

checkPermission

public static boolean checkPermission(RedstoneChips rc,
                                      org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                      String commandName,
                                      boolean opRequired,
                                      boolean report)
Checks whether the command sender has a permission to use a command.

Parameters:
rc -
sender -
commandName - command name without the slash (/).
opRequired - used in case a permission plugin was not found. If set to true, permission is only granted if the sender is op.
report - Determines whether an error message is sent to the sender in case it doesn't have permission.
Returns:
true if the sender has permission to use the command.
